author: rgoers
msg: Portal: PageLabels can now be configured to be part of the url.
Made the pool-max values in the html block's generators externally configurable. Made sitemap
reloading externally configurable. Made pipeline amd encodeURLTransformer pool-max values

author: randyk
msg: Enable check routine to handle Apache/2.2, which changed the name of the Apache binary under Win32 to httpd.exe.
